p: Cardamom ( Elettaria cardamomum) contains 1,8-cineole as one of the main active constituents [ 80]. This bicyclic monoterpenoid has been shown to activate TRPA1, but not TRPV1 channels [ 81]. In contrast, Takaishi and his colleagues reported that 1,8-cineole is a natural antagonist of human TRPA1 channels [ 82]. This bimodal action has been reported with menthol, in which the activity at the mouse TRPA1 was concentration dependent; it was an agonist at low concentrations and an antagonist at higher concentrations [ 83].
